topMural.alt: Mural celebrating women of Constituent Assembly

visionBlock.title: VOICES OF VISION
visionBlock.description: This mural celebrates the 15 women members of the Constituent Assembly, who played a pivotal role in shaping the nation’s Constitution.

indiaMap.title: VOICES OF VISION
indiaMap.description: This sculpture represents India through repurposed industrial scrap, symbolizing inclusivity and harmony.

centerHero.description:
This mural celebrates the 15 women members of the Constituent Assembly, who played a pivotal role in shaping the nation’s Constitution.

With a shared commitment to democracy, these women advocated for rights and equality, ensuring that the Constitution reflected the aspirations of all citizens.
